Item.Message: Merlan.... What are you doing here??
Young Jester... I am here to warn you. Do NOT enter that door... If you do, you will have to face yourself.
Myself? What are you talking about you crazy old man?
Do not heed my warning if you wish. But don't say I didn't warn you...
Right, yeah, doom and gloom, I've been stuck here for ages, I just want to get out... And get my revenge of course.
Revenge is a path that you don't want to take, believe me. It will only end in your demise.
Okay Merlan, whatever, I'm going to go anyway, because theres not really anything you can do to stop me.
I guess I could turn you into a frog... but, no, that is not the path in which you should take. But neither is this one. *Sigh* Fine, use your scepter to get yourself out.
Yeah, thanks... MOM Bye... Crazy old fool.
